column5: Looking to take the better half's dad up to Simcoe on Sunday.  He used to fish it years ago, through the ice, but, hasn't been up there for a long time. The two of us are going on foot with the hut and gear, but, I was wondering if anyone offers a taxi service out on the ice?  Thanks, Frank

Most outfitters out there have a quad or sled or truck with a sleigh and I'm sure if you offer them a couple bucks they'll take you out to at least their huts! I know theres a bunch in gilford and a bunch at killarney beach. best bet is to give them a call and see.
